Truckee/Tahoe/Squaw

11 Apr 2019 - Michelle Ho

Back to skiing, which is our first time since leaving Utah.

A year after watching G.N.A.R., I was really excited to see the cliffs and hopefully spy a naked skier or two. On our second day, we saw someone huck a backflip off a cliff during the Red Bull Raid. Squallywood delivers!
